definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Meshes with vertex colors, normals and one or two UV sets.
sentences.chinese: 网格模型包含顶点颜色，法线，一到两个uv集。

sentences.english: After flip it may have some question with Normal, we should calculate the normal.
sentences.chinese: 翻转之后法线会有一些问题，我们需要重新计算法线。

sentences.english: After flip it may have some question with Normal, we should calculate the normal.
sentences.chinese: 翻转之后法线会有一些问题，我们需要重新计算法线。

sentences.english: It also shows that the peak value of the emissivity is sometimes far away from the normal direction.
sentences.chinese: 同时也发现，它的发射率峰值有时在远离法线的区域。

sentences.english: How do I apply generated normals to a bitmap?
sentences.chinese: 我如何申请生成法线到位图？

sentences.english: This is necessary for normal mapping to work.
sentences.chinese: 这是法线贴图运作时所必须的。

sentences.english: Also make sure the surface normals are pointing outwards .
sentences.chinese: 也确定表面的法线指向外面。

sentences.english: Because one vertex can only have one normal, you must duplicate the vertices as well.
sentences.chinese: 由于一个顶点只能有一条法线，所以还要复制顶点。

sentences.english: This method itself is independent of the normal directions on the magnetopause.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法本身与磁层顶的法线方向无关。

sentences.english: DepthTextureMode. DepthNormals : depth and view space normals packed into one texture.
sentences.chinese: 将深度与视空间法线结合在一张纹理中。

sentences.english: If enabled, geometry normals will be updated with the bone animation.
sentences.chinese: 如果开启，几何体法线将随着骨骼动画更新。

sentences.english: Original: "This hack supposedly enables its user to receive less damage than normal."
sentences.chinese: 这个文丐假想使它的用户接受较少损伤比法线。

sentences.english: First of all, the normals of the mix points are estimated by principle of mirror reflection.
sentences.chinese: 首先，根据镜面反射的原理求出混合点的法线。

sentences.english: The term light painting also encompasses images lit from outside the frame with hand-held light sources.
sentences.chinese: 灯绘也包括光绘图象由法线框架外手持的光源。

sentences.english: Components group also can be used as occluder when occlusion culling is used.
sentences.chinese: 在实际绘制时，通过组法线可以批量剔除不可视部件。

sentences.english: If the mesh contains no normals an empty array will be returned.
sentences.chinese: 如果网格不包含法线，一个空的数组将会被返回。
